data.title: Used Raymond 740R45TT Reach Trucks
data.meta-description: Used Raymond 740R45TT Reach Trucks For Sale at ASI, In Stock, 280" Lift Height, Cleaned, Painted, 4,500 lb. capacity, call today for a quote on Used Raymond 740R45TT Reach Truck

attribute.name: Battery
attribute.value: 36V (Battery Sold Separately, Battery Charger Included with Reach Truck

long-description.p: Used Raymond 740R45TT Reach Trucks For Sale at American Surplus are in Stock. All forklifts from ASI are cleaned, painted, and have our 30-day guarantee. These trucks were made in 2006 by Raymond. They have a 4,500 lb. capacity and a 280" lift height. They also feature a sideshifter for better handling. They run off a 36V battery, sold separately and we include the battery chargers with the reach truck. Call our sales team for more specs and info on our Used Raymond 740R45TT Reach Trucks.

p.strong: We can’t list our entire inventory online, if you do not see what you are looking for, just ask! Quantity discounts available on used reach trucks 40-60% off the price of new. Call 800-876-3736 for additional information & a free quote. American Surplus will provide a quote on new equipment if used is unavailable. Nationwide shipping is available. Price and product availability subject to change without notice. Inventory is subject to prior sale.
